name: Cubey the Horrified Ai, and I
name_original: Cubey the Horrified Ai, and I
description:
Help Cubey (the not so intelligent AI) survive  the monsters by shooting them. You control the gun, while Cubey will try its best to avoid the monsters. Safety not guaranteed. Beware... Cubey might be smart enough to avoid monsters, but is definitely not trained to avoid the deathly pools of lava. Shoot monsters (using your mouse) and steer away from lava by using the recoil of your gun! Enjoy!

This game was made by Samuwhale and Nalloenoe for the Wowie Game Jam 4, where the theme was 'collaboration with AI'.

(Note: WebGL version might run slow. Try out the Windows/Mac version if possible.)
